products.title: Nike Men's Air Force 1 Shoes - White/White
products.longDescription: Hoops in the park, Sunday BBQs and sunshine. The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 ’07, the b-ball OG that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: crisp leather in an all-white colorway for a statement look on and off the court.
products.features:
• Full-grain leather in the upper adds a premium look and feel.
  • Originally designed for performance hoops, Nike Air cushioning adds lightweight, all-day comfort.
  • The low-cut silhouette adds a simple, streamlined look.
  • Padding at the collar feels soft and comfortable.
  • Foam midsole
  • Metal "AF1" dubrae
  • Perforations on the toe
  • Rubber sole
  • Full Grain Cow Leather

products.title: adidas Men's Grand Court Shoes - White/Black - White/Black
products.longDescription: A ’70s style reborn. These adidas shoes take inspiration from iconic sport styles of the past and move them into the future. The shoes craft an everyday look with a smooth leather upper. Signature 3-Stripes flash along the sides. Plush midsole cushioning gives comfort to every step.
products.features:
• Lace closure 
  • Leather upper 
  • Rubber outsole 
  • Cloudfoam Comfort sockliner 
  • Soft feel

products.title: Helly Hansen Men's Gerton Mid Boots - Bushwacker
products.longDescription: Rugged, yet refined; the felt-lined Gerton leather mid-cut is your perfect everyday partner with jeans once fall settles and cold weather sets in. This stylish, yet functional shoe is ideal for any kind of recreational urban lifestyle.
products.features:
• Leather heel counter
  • Warm felt lining
  • Protective Rubber cup sole
  • Removeable EVA comfort footbed
  • HellyGrip rubber
  • Premium quality leather
  • Waterproof leather
  • Waterproof leather

products.title: adidas Men's Roguera Shoes - White/White
products.longDescription: Feel the power of the fitness trends of the ’80s. These shoes modernise a classic trainer with all-day style and comfort. They feature a coated leather upper and an iconic twin-cup midsole to give you more spring in your step.
products.features:
• Lace closure
  • Coated leather upper
  • Rubber outsole; Textile lining
  • Lightweight EVA midsole; Adibouncy lightweight EVA sockliner

products.title: Under Armour Men's Playmaker Fix SL Sandals - White/Black - White / Black
products.priceLongMessage: Women's & Men's Shoes 25% Off* Our in-store ticket price. Select styles. Excluding items already marked down. Selection and availability may vary by location. Order must be completed by November 12, 2020 1:59 AM ET to qualify.
products.longDescription: The Under Armour Men’s Playmaker SL Sandals have a sleek, fixed strap with added foam underneath for an extra comfortable fit.
products.features:
• Strategically placed perforations over the foot for increased ventilation
  • Drop-in EVA footbed provides underfoot cushioning
  • EVA outsole delivers great durability & traction

products.title: adidas Men's Ultra Boost Running Shoes - White - Wht/Wht/Whtwhite/White/White
products.longDescription: Lean into your stride, keep pushing forward and don't let up until you cross the finish line. The adidas men's Ultra Boost running shoes harness the energy-returning power of Boost cushioning to deliver an energised push-off with each footstrike. An adaptive, foot-hugging adidas Primeknit upper combined with targeted support in the midfoot and heel provides a locked-down fit. A grippy outsole grabs the road and other surfaces with superior traction for a smooth ride.
products.features:
• Boost is adidas' most responsive cushioning ever: The more energy you give, the more you get
  • adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot in adaptive support and ultralight comfort; Engineered knit for enhanced breathability in key sweat zones
  • Torsion System between the heel and forefoot for a stable ride; Supportive cage wraps around the midfoot for a locked-down fit
  • Fitcounter moulded heel counter provides a natural fit that allows optimal movement of the Achilles
  • Continental rubber outsole for extraordinary traction in wet and dry conditions; Stretchweb rubber outsole flexes underfoot for an energised ride

products.title: adidas Men's Questar Flow Parley Shoes - Legend Ink/Core Black - White/Lightblue
products.longDescription:
Street style for those with running on the brain. These adidas shoes pair pillow-soft Cloudfoam cushioning with a fresh, modern upper to own the pavement. An OrthoLite® sockliner adds to the comfort, and floating 3-Stripes boast adidas pride.

These shoes feature Parley Ocean Plastic™ which is made from recycled waste, intercepted from beaches and coastal communities before it reaches the ocean.
products.features:
• Lace closure
  • Textile upper with TPU details
  • Combined Cloudfoam midsole and outsole; Textile lining; Heel pull
  • Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite® sockliner
  • Ultra-soft feel

products.title: Under Armour Men's Charged Ultimate 3.0 Training Shoes - White/Black - Wht/Blk/Whtonyx White/Black/Summit White
products.longDescription: The Under Armour Men’s Charged Ultimate 3.0 Training Shoe features a Charged Cushioning® midsole that absorbs impact & converts it into a responsive burst.
products.features:
• Durable, lightweight upper with lateral rubber forefoot wrap to provide optimal stability & traction
  • External heel counter adds support & heel lockdown
  • Cushioned sockliner molds to the shape of your foot, eliminating slippage & providing ideal underfoot comfort
  • Full length EVA midsole for a stable cushioned platform with Charged Cushioning® in the heel for a responsive ride
  • Full-length, non-marking, rubber outsole increases durability, traction & support
  • Strategically placed flex grooves & unique rubber pattern covers outsole for multi-surface traction & superior flexibility

products.title: adidas Men's Samba OG Shoes - White/Black - White/Black/White
products.longDescription: Born on the soccer field, the adidas Men’s Samba OG Shoe is a timeless icon of street style. These shoes stay true to their legacy with a soft leather upper and suede overlays.
products.features:
• Regular fit
  • Lace closure
  • Full grain leather upper with gritty suede and gold foil details
  • Synthetic leather lining; Gum rubber cupsole
  • Gum rubber midsole

products.title: Converse Men's Chuck Taylor All Star Street Shoes - Papyrus/White/Black
products.longDescription: Camp Pop - Modern updates give the Chuck Taylor All Star High Street sneaker supreme comfort and a little edge. Mid-top canvas design is styled with camo pops and suede panels. A padded collar and inner elastic tongue add an extra dose of comfort and support. OrthoLite insole takes cushioning to the next level. Unstoppable.
products.features:
• Durable, mid-top canvas shoe with suede panels and camo accents
  • Padded collar and tongue
  • OrthoLite insole helps keep it comfortable
  • Diamond pattern outsole

products.title: Nike Men's Air Max 270 Shoes - White/Black - White/Black/White
products.longDescription: Boasting the first-ever Max Air unit created specifically for Nike Sportswear, Nike Air Max 270 Men's Shoe delivers visible air under every step. Updated for modern comfort, it nods to the original, 1991 Air Max 180 with its exaggerated tongue top and heritage tongue logo.
products.features:
• Large volume Max Air unit offers responsive cushioning.
  • Neoprene stretch bootie construction delivers a snug fit.
  • 3-piece midsole offers durability and a smooth transition.
  • Mono-mesh window in the quarter and engineered mesh in the forefoot offer breathability.
  • Rubber toe tip offers durability in a high-wear area. It reads "AIR" on the tip.
  • Design lines, tongue logo and exaggerated tongue top nod to the original Air Max 180 of 1991.

products.title: The North Face Men's Tsumoru Winter Boot - Tarmac Green/Black - Green
products.priceLongMessage: Women's & Men's Shoes 25% Off* Our in-store ticket price. Select styles. Excluding items already marked down. Selection and availability may vary by location. Order must be completed by November 12, 2020 1:59 AM ET to qualify.
products.longDescription: The North Face Men's Tsumoru Winter Boot features a lightweight EVA shell protection and has simple, clean styling that come together in an insulated and waterproof package that easily fends off winter's worst.
products.features:
• PU-coated, ballistic-mesh upper
  • Durable TNF Winter Grip® rubber outsole
  • Midfoot internal shank
  • 200 g PrimaLoft® Silver Insulation Eco
  • HydroSeal® waterproof membrane
  • Cozy fleece lining
  • Dual-injection-molded EVA shell provides protection in a lightweight package
  • Injection-molded EVA midsole

products.title: Nike Men's Air Max 97 Shoes - White/Wolf Grey/Black - White
products.longDescription: Inspired by a high-speed bullet train, Men’s Nike Air Max 97 Shoe brings back a running icon with a plush, lightweight upgrade. It modernizes its retro design with a knit upper, welded overlays and a Max Air unit for all-day comfort.
products.features:
• Max Air unit provides lightweight cushioning.
  • Knit upper has a soft, textured surface.
  • Low-profile rubber enhances durability with a clean look.
  • Welded design lines are inspired by the original Air Max 97 shoe.

products.title: ASICS Men's Gel Rocket 9 Running Shoes - White/Black/Gold - White/Black/Gold
products.priceLongMessage: ASICS Men's Gel Rocket 9 Running Shoes - White/Black/Gold - 30% Off Our Regular Price of $99.99. Selection & availability may vary by location, order must be completed by November 12, 2020 1:59 AM ET to qualify.
products.longDescription: The ASICS Men’s Gel Rocket 9 Running Shoe boasts forefoot GEL™ technology for shock absorption and a springy EVA midsole to give players a real boost on the court. The TRUSSTIC SYSTEM™ component under the midfoot works to control torsion and provide support when making multi-directional movements, while the moulded EVA sockliner is removable to allow space for players to add their own medical orthotics.
products.features:
• GEL™ for long lasting cushioning and shock absorption
  • A springy EVA midsole to give players a real boost on the court
  • TRUSSTIC SYSTEM™ component under the midfoot works to control torsion and provide support when making multi-directional movements
  • Removable insole to accommodate orthotics

products.title: Nike Men's Shox NZ EU Shoes - White - White/White
products.longDescription: The Men’s Nike Shox NZ EU Shoe offers responsive 4-column cushioning and finger construction through the midfoot that helps lock down the fit. The Nike Shox technology under the heel distributes weight to maximize impact absorption.
products.features:
• Finger construction through the midfoot provides support and flexibility.
  • Synthetic leather overlays for durability.
  • Lightweight Phylon cushions the forefoot.
  • Pebax® plate over the Shox columns helps provide lateral stability and support.
  • Solid rubber, tacky Waffle outsole tread for great traction.

products.title: Nike Men's Air Force 1 High '07 Shoes - White/White
products.longDescription: The Nike Air Force 1 High ’07 Men’s Shoe is a testament to the tried and true perfection of this style’s legacy. Tumbled and full-grain leather come together for a premium feel from toe to heel, while an Air-Sole unit means the comfort never stops.
products.features:
• Padded high-cut collar provides a secure, comfortable fit
  • Metal deubré on the laces reads “AF-1 ‘82” to commemorate the year the shoe debuted
  • Perforations in the upper add breathability
  • PU midsole gives you full-length durability and stability
  • Nike Air cushioning for all-day comfort
  • Pivot points in the outsole help with transitions in all directions
  • Cow Leather

products.title: Nike Men's LeBron 17 Basketball Shoes - White
products.longDescription: The LeBron 17 harnesses LeBron’s strength and speed with containment and support for all-court domination. It features a lightweight mix of knit and heat-molded yarns that give each one a durable look and feel. Combined cushioning provides LeBron with the impact support and responsive energy return he needs to power through the long season.
products.features:
• Full-Court control - KnitPosite is a combination of flyknit construction and pre-twisted, heat-molded yarns that form swirled patterns. The result is light, durable and supportive, with each shoe having a look that's subtly one-of-a-kind
  • Shock Absorption and explosiveness - Designed specifically for Lebron, Nike Basketball's largest heel Max Air unit to date absorbs more force than previous designs. Visible, maximum-volume Zoom Air units under the ball of the foot provide quick, continuous responsiveness to generate fast-paced action
  • Easy Entry - Wide collar with traditional tongue makes putting on and taking off easy while providing a comfortable, locked-in feel
  • Soft foam pod directly under the Max Air unit adds cushioning in the heel
  • Stabilizing plastic clip wraps around heel to lock you in
  • Resilient foam midsole
  • Durable rubber outsole

products.title: Nike Men's React Phantom Run Flyknit 2 Running Shoes - True White/White-black-pure Platinum
products.longDescription: The Nike React Phantom Run Flyknit 2 offers versatility for the everyday runner. Building on the foundation of its predecessor, the shoe expands on its laceless design by adding secure support that feels like it "disappears" on your foot. More foam means better cushioning, keeping you comfortable as you run.
products.features:
• Secure Feel - The latest in Flywire technology features an elastic design that intertwines with the Flyknit upper, helping your foot feel secure as you run
  • Lightweight and Breathable - FlyKnit Loft uses 3 forefoot layers. They combine for a lightweight, breathable and durable feel that keeps your foot comfortable
  • Smooth and Responsive - Nike React technology delivers a soft, responsive ride. It provides support for the 3 phases of a runner's stride—flexibility at toe-off, a smooth ride at mid-stance and cushioning at contact
  • Increased rubber at the outsole helps deliver better traction and durability
  • Molding around the heel keeps you feeling secure so you can focus on your route
  • Synthetic leather and textile materials in upper

products.title: ASICS Men's Gel Infinity Jin Running Shoes - White/Classic Red Retro Tokyo
products.longDescription: Heritage driven and performance-inspired, the GEL-QUANTUM INFINITY™ JIN sneaker references the evolving lineage of the GEL-KINSEI™ series. Engineered with a sleek mesh upper for seamless flexibility and ventilation, this silhouette also features a U-throat design that helps create a sock-like fit. Borrowing the advanced TRUSSTIC SYSTEM™ technology from the GEL-KINSEI™ 6 running shoe for improved midsole stability, this shoe also implements our GEL™ technology cushioning system in the heel for pronounced comfort. Additionally, this advanced component is rendered with a glossy application that looks like it has been dipped in water. Referencing the rich ASICS heritage in performance running, the GEL-QUANTUM INFINITY™ JIN sneaker continues to push the boundaries for the brand’s progress in design and comfort.
products.features:
• Heritage driven and performance-inspired, the GEL-QUANTUM INFINITY™ JIN sneaker references the evolving lineage of the GEL-KINSEI™ series
  • Engineered with a sleek mesh upper for seamless flexibility and ventilation, this silhouette also features a U-throat design that helps create a sock-like fit
  • 0

products.title: Nike Men's Adapt BB 2.0 Basketball Shoes - White/Black/Multi-color
products.longDescription: Riding the momentum of last year’s hit auto-lacing basketball shoe, the Nike Adapt BB 2.0 delivers the same consistent, customized fit, now with more of the game-changing technology revealed. Ultra-responsive cushioning is curved to follow the natural motion of your foot, providing continuous energy return on the court.
products.features:
• Nike FitAdapt Technology - Power laces lock you in at the press of a button—built into the shoe or controlled via smartphone
  • Turbocharged Cushioning - A large Nike Zoom Air Turbo cushioning unit sits under the ball of your foot. It's articulated to engage at different angles, staying responsive as you run and cut
  • Lightweight Containment - The upper is made with moldable TPU yarns, making it incredibly light and supportive. The molded heel piece helps lock in your ankle
  • Foam midsole
  • Tongue and heel pull tabs
  • Padded collar

products.title: Nike Men's KD Trey 5 VIII Basketball Shoes - White/Royal Tint/Clear
products.longDescription: Kevin Durant goes all out every play and needs his shoes to keep up. The KD Trey 5 VIII features soft, responsive foam cushioning paired with multidirectional traction for control. The mid-top design with perforated foam pods helps you feel locked in around the ankle.
products.features:
• Play With Bounce - Dual-density midsole features soft, responsive foam with a distinct dimpled texture supported by a firmer foam for stability
  • Ankle Support - A mid-high collar is layered with foam to provide comfort and support all around your ankle
  • On-Court Control - The rubber outsole with a wavy tread pattern provides durable, multidirectional traction for fast stops and starts. KD's logo is molded into the rubber
  • 2-layer textile material in the forefoot includes clear yarns that give it a dynamic look
  • The padded, breathable tongue is topped with raw-edge detail

products.title: Nike Unisex KD Trey 5 VII TB Basketball Shoes - White/Black/Red - White
products.longDescription: Kevin Durant likes a shoe that feels broken-in right away but still provides containment and support. The KD Trey 5 VII nails it all around, combining bouncy cushioning with a precise, supportive fit that’s ready to go right out of the box.
products.features:
• Bouncy Cushioning - Nike Renew foam is designed with more room to compress, providing plush cushioning with springy responsiveness during the game.
  • Comfort and Support - Engineered mesh in the upper and a plush, padded collar provide all-around comfort and support without excess bulk.
  • Durability and Traction - The solid rubber outsole holds up to wear and tear while providing excellent on-court traction.
    Reinforced toe helps resist abrasion.
  • Premium KD storytelling details

products.title: Converse Men's All Star Pro Hi Basketball Shoes - Pale Putty/Lotus Pink/Azure
products.longDescription: Full court press. Future generation. Full containment. The Converse All Star Pro BB basketball shoe was made for the court. The high-top performance silhouette is improved with lightweight and durable woven materials that provide lockdown support during gameplay. A Nike React midsole cushions every step for increased impact protection, from take-off to landing. The addition of a lightweight rubber cupsole enhances traction. 3, 2, 1.
products.features:
• Performance mid-top basketball sneaker
  • Durable, lightweight woven upper for lockdown support
  • Nike react cushioning for on-court protection, range of motion, and responsiveness
  • Multi-directional outsole traction helps provide durability
  • Rubber cupsole

products.title: Nike Men's Renew Run Running Shoes - White/Black Univ Red Gum Lt Brown Thunde
products.longDescription: The Nike Renew Run keeps you moving with softer foam for a cushioned feel. Designed with the everyday runner in mind, it delivers secure support and durable traction for comfort.
products.features:
• Ventilated Cool - Breathable mesh in the upper helps keep you secure and comfortable while increasing airflow. Its stretchy material provides a better fit for more room at the toes
  • Cushioned Performance - A dual-density midsole gives you a soft, cushioned ride with Lunar foam underfoot. The design is constructed to run along the sidewall, providing comfort with every step
  • Traction, Ready to Run - The durable rubber outsole provides traction where you need it to help you stay focused on the miles ahead
  • Inspired by You - The black speckle is inspired by runners like you when kicking up asphalt while logging miles on those soft-gravel backroads
  • Synthetic leather and textile materials in upper
  • Overlay at the toe
  • TPU-outlined Swoosh design
  • TPU-outlined Swoosh design
